title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 60-2.3 - Identification of manufacturer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 60-2.3 - Identification of manufacturer

State Regulations

The label affixed to the immediate container in which the drug is sold or dispensed shall indicate the name and strength of the drug product and its manufacturer, unless the prescriber specifically states otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
60-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
